name: vs really cool bird
description:
do you stand a chance against
Really Cool Bird...?

an unofficial undertale fan battle where you fight
the coolest opponent out there

[Z/Enter] Confirm
[X] Cancel
[WASD/Arrow Keys] Move
[Space] Jump
[F4] Fullscreen
[ESC] Pause

play in-browser or download windows version for free
good luck... and stay cool
